suggestion: Compost vegetable scraps or feed to livestock if fresh. Avoid sending to landfill.
Fruits can be composted or turned into bioenzymes or smoothies if not rotten.
Milk or Dairy product can be used as fertilizer in diluted form or made into milk paint.
Meat should not be composted at home; wrap and dispose properly or give to animal shelters if still fresh.
Eggshells can be crushed and added to compost or used in gardening as calcium booster.
Stale bread or cooked rice can be composted or dried and powdered for garden mulch.
